label: Bb Role Utility
description: Executes all three functions - Display Entitlements, Role Download, and Role Compare.

label: Bb Display Entitlements
description: Displays entitlements for all system roles on the current Blackboard page.

label: Bb Role Compare
description: Compares system roles against a JSON file to highlight mismatches.

label: Bb Role Download
description: Downloads all system roles and their entitlements as a JSON file.

label: Bb Analytics IDs
description: Highlights Ultra page elements with Analytics IDs with click to copy to clipboard function.

label: Bb User Details
description: Shows addtional user information on Admin > Users list.

label: Bb Course Details
description: Shows addtional course information on Admin > Courses list.

label: Ultra Course Roster
description: Printable roster from in the Ultra course.

label: Building Blocks Compare
description: Dowload B2 list and upload to compare between versions or systems.
